body_html:
This new function needs to be referenced in the documentation here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/train#Decaying_the_learning_rate

Only tf.train.cosine_decay is referenced there. cosine_decay just decreases the learning rate town to its minimum. It does not restart.

By the way the documentation of cosine_decay should be corrected too. It mentions the SGDR article "with warm restarts" but it never states that it is NOT the cosine decay with restarts mentioned in the article.
